content:
# The attempt to print the current player position resulted in an error indicating that the `player` variable is not defined. This suggests that I may not have access to the player object or that it has not been properly initialized in the current context.

# Given the ongoing issues with player positioning and the inability to place the stone furnace, it may be beneficial to reset the player position or reinitialize the player object.

# I will try to reset the player position to a known location (0, 0) and then attempt to move towards the coal position again.

# Resetting player position to (0, 0) if possible.
reset_player_position(Position(x=0, y=0))  # Attempt to reset player position. 

# After resetting, I will move to (20, -12) and then to (22.5, -14.5) again.
move_to(Position(x=20, y=-12))  # Move to a position closer to coal.
move_to(Position(x=22.5, y=-14.5))  # Finally, move to the coal position again.
